name: Dat Beat!
description:
A to select at menus and arrows to change selection.
in game press the arrows on keyboard and try to make what's on screen. oof this project is 28,671 KB and compared to a few large 3D games THATS HUGE i bet its from all the music.
What's new?
2/19/2021
I added number countdown and made the UI for the beats slightly brighter.

2/25/21: added therefore i am

I'm sorry I cant make it playable in browser for itch.io. play here for browser https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/485412414/
